text: Shaw Taylor MBE (26 October 1924 - 17 March 2015) was a British actor and television presenter. He had many acting roles in movie and television since the 1950s. He presented many game shows including Password, Tell the Truth, Dotto, This Is Your Chance and The Law Game (BBC Radio 2). Taylor died at his Totland, Isle of Wight home, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters Category:English voice actors Category:Television personalities from London
title: Shaw Taylor
